pulumiOrganization.description: The Pulumi Organization you are deploying the website with. You only need to set this option if you are using an Organization in the Pulumi Service.

withCDN.description: Provision CloudFront CDN to serve content.

targetDomain.description: The domain used to serve the content. A Route53 hosted zone must exist for this domain.

sitePath.description: The root directory containing the website's contents.

indexHTML.description: The default document for the site. Defaults to index.html

certificateARN.description: The ARN of the ACM certificate to use for serving HTTPS. If one is not provided, a certificate will be created during the provisioning process.

cacheTTL.description: TTL in seconds for cached objects.

withLogs.description: Provision a bucket to hold access logs.

priceClass.description: The price class to use for the CloudFront configuration. Defaults to 100 if not specified. Valid values are `all`, `100`, and `200`

enableLambdaEdgeCacheControl.description: Enable a cache control header to be attached to every request from an Lambda@Edge Function. This will require you to have a `package.json` available so the Lambda can be serialized.

bucketName.description: The name of the s3 bucket containing the website contents.

bucketWebsiteURL.description: The website URL for the s3 bucket.

cdnDomainName.description: The domain name for the CDN.

logsBucketName.description: The name of the s3 bucket containing the access logs.

websiteURL.description: The URL to access the website
